content:
Thunderbird 102 is no longer supported it is so old, and here you are asking about something that was introduced in V91. https://www.thunderbird.net/en-GB/thunderbird/91.0/whatsnew/

I do not have access to such an old version to give you direct instructions, so I will hope that the ancient version you have is sufficiently like the current version that you can find the helper applications in settings to change your preferred helper application for PDF files.

The following image is what it looks like in version 1280 You of course will be selecting the PDF entry not the ZIP entry like I was in this image.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Thanks, Matt, for your help with my question. I've now found the Files & Attachments section in v102 -- one of the options for PDF files is Use Adobe Acrobat (default) and that must have been ticked (by default) in earlier versions from 91. Tbird, in its wisdom, changed that in my copy of ver 102, and I have now changed it back to the Adobe option as above.

While I'm grateful that you identified the settings element that I wanted, I was very surprised that, particularly as you are a Moderator, you chose to use such pejorative language answering my question. There are many Tbird users who, for good reasons (usually associated with add-ons that are not available in later versions), use an older version. I do hope you will treat future enquiries from users of older versions with a little more understanding and kindness.
creator: Lindsay13Graham

content: You need to provide some details on this, such as domain name, incoming and outgoing server settings (preferably screenshots) and full content of any error messages, plus any information on the situation. Thank you.

content: mijn mozilla account wachtwoord
creator: k.kapteyn

content:
In dat geval is het niet direct Thunderbird-gerelateerd. Informatie over het opnieuw instellen van uw wachtwoord vindt u in:

  • Het wachtwoord van uw Mozilla-account wijzigen of herinitialiseren
  • Het wachtwoord van uw Mozilla-account opnieuw instellen met herstelsleutels

Hopelijk is dit voldoende om vooruit te kunnen!
creator: markh2

content: het wachtwoord kan ik niet wijzigen want ik weet mijn oorspronkelijke wachtwoord niet meer. ik heb dus wel toegang tot mijn account , maar een andere email provider vraagt om mijn accountwachtwoord. kan ik dus zonder problemen met herstelsleutels het wachtwoord opnieuw instellen ?
creator: k.kapteyn

content: I suggest highlighting the folder, rightclick, and select 'compact'
creator: davidsk

content: By 'incorporate', you are asking if you can move the messages from zimbra to gmail, yes you can. A possible approach: - using the addon, importexporttools, do this - highlight the desize zimbra folder - righclick and select importexportoption o export as EML files - when done, highlight the desired gmail folder and select the importexport option to import EML files
creator: davidsk

content: Thank you very much for your prompt and informative response. Yes, I do mean move my messages. Can you please tell me here I can find the "importexporttools" add-on.
creator: dforrest

content: - click the hamburger menu in upper right - click addons - in the searchbox, enter importexport and install the addon - then, follow steps in earlier response
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks again. I see the add-on is already there but it is noted as "disabled".
creator: dforrest

content: - click view>layout>message list header - then, click the icon to the right of the quickfilter box and tick 'table view'
